inclusion.criterion: Patient is able to understand study procedure and agrees to participate in the study by giving written informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is scheduled to receive a highly emetogenic cyclophosphamide IV chemotherapy (3 g/m2) for autologous PBSC harvesting
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Negative urine pregnancy test for women of childbearing age
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Serious accompanying disorders or impaired organ function (in particular impaired left ventricular function or severe cardiac arrhythmias)
exclusion.label: not_met
